file_content.text: Piece of advice--you better shape up, or Chemish won't be happy.
There aren't a lot of second chances here. You're lucky.
If I could handle a blaster like you, I'd be with one of the ambush teams taking out Imperial patrols.
Nice work in the droid factory. I tried to get in there once... couldn't manage it.
When the Empire sees the damage from those power cores, heads will roll.
Hey, look--it's good to have you with us.
You've heard about the Eagle, right? Gray Star taught the Eagle everything he knows.
Balmorra needs to be a free world. We're going to make that happen.
No offense, but I'm not sure I want you here.
I don't see why we need some outsider coming in to help.
You've got a chance to prove yourself, but that doesn't mean you're one of us.
